verbose_text: In PMNs, we found that caspase-1 inhibition significantly reduced IL-1beta and IL-8 production in a dose dependent manner (XREF_FIG; P < 0.05), suggesting that B. pseudomallei triggers IL-1beta processing through the activation of a caspase-1-dependent pathway.
evidence: caspase-1 inhibition significantly reduced IL-1beta and IL-8
